Uses of Interface
java.nio.file.DirectoryStream.Filter

Packages that use DirectoryStream.Filter
Package
Description
java.nio.file
Defines interfaces and classes for the Java virtual machine to access files, file attributes, and file systems.
java.nio.file.spi
Service-provider classes for the java.nio.file package.

  • Uses of DirectoryStream.Filter in java.nio.file

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static DirectoryStream<Path>
    Files.newDirectoryStream(Path dir, DirectoryStream.Filter<? super Path> filter)
    Opens a directory, returning a DirectoryStream to iterate over the entries in the directory.
